item.description:
Last year I tried getting groups together last season for a whale watch . It just didn't work out for some reason or another. So, let's give it another go!ot to be daunted, I am giving it another shot.
Check out: www.7seaswhalewatch.com



UPDATE 5/ 25:After sending out messages, posting this event on 5 sites, I do not have enough solid "yes" RSVP for the discount. IF YOU DO WISH TO GO: you will need to phone 7 Seas Whale Watch at 978.283.1776 to make your own reservation. The cost is: $45.00 (they discount to AAA, Military, Seniors, Educators, and more)


PRICE: $45.00 regular adult price ( AAA discount $5.00 , Senior etc)
Reservations are a MUST!
Several discounts may apply
Check Out : www.7seaswhalewatch.com


Phone: 978-283-1776

TIME: 1:00 is tentative ( I am writing this in MARCH and looking at last yr's schedule!!!)
* I will update as soon as possible


WHAT TO BRING: It can get quite cold out on the water in May, so make sure to dress for it. Check the website for particulars

OK........ So, later on we can head over to Captain Carlo's for food and live entertainment outside on their fabulous , huge deck overlooking the harbor area!! . SUNDAYS ARE USUALLY 'REGGAE' ONES! Again, I will need to update what band will be playing. During the summer months it's sometimes reggae.
Check out: wwwcaptaincarlos.com ( menu, pricing and entertainment)

** NOTE: This event is shared among 5 meetup groups. I am hoping for a good turnout! Also, adults only. This event is weather permitting! I will be updating as we get closer to the date.
Please check back. NEED TO CARPOOL? Add it to your RSVP or try contacting a fellow member near you.
item.how_to_find_us: We will all meetup where we purchase tickets
item.name: Sunday Afternoon Whale Watch and More - Update: 5/25
